title: Bart De Wever - Wikipedia
snippet: On 3 February 2025, De Wever took the oath of office, becoming the first Flemish nationalist politician to hold the office of prime minister of Belgium. Bart Albert Liliane De Wever was born on 21 December 1970 in Mortsel and grew up in Kontich, where his parents Irene and Henri owned a small ...

title: PM meeting with Belgian Prime Minister Bart de Wever: 12 December 2025 - GOV.UK
snippet: The Prime Minister met Belgian Prime Minister Bart de Wever in Downing Street this afternoon.

title: PM meeting with Belgian Prime Minister Bart de Wever: 12 December 2025
snippet: From: Prime Minister's Office, 10 Downing Street and The Rt Hon Sir Keir Starmer KCB KC MP Published 12 December 2025 Â· The Prime Minister met Belgian Prime Minister Bart de Wever in Downing Street this afternoon.

title: Biography | Bart De Wever
snippet: Bart De Wever (b. 1970) has been Prime Minister of Belgium since 3 February 2025. He is the first Flemish nationalist to hold this position. He previously served as Mayor of Antwerp from January 2013 to February 2025, and is still titular mayor of the city.

title: 'Fundamentally wrong': Belgian prime minister doubles down on opposition to reparations loan | Euronews
snippet: The 27 EU leaders will gather in Brussels on 18-19 December to make a decision, which is necessary to approve Ukraine's new programme with the International Monetary Fund. Bart De Wever has so far opposed the reparations loan. European Union, 2025.
